ARABIC: أُبَلِّغُكُمْ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّى وَأَنَا۠ لَكُمْ نَاصِحٌ أَمِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: transmitting my Lord's Message to you, and I am a faithful counsellor to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I bring to you the messages of my Lord. I am your sincere friend.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I convey to you the messages of my Lord, and I give you sincere advice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I preach the message of my Lord to you and am a trustworthy advisor for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “I convey to you the messages of my Lord and am your trustworthy well-wisher.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: I convey unto you the Messages of my Lord, and I am a trustworthy adviser (or well-wisher) for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: I deliver to you the messages of my Lord and I am a faithful adviser to you:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I deliver to you the Messages of my Lord; I am your adviser sincere, faithful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: I convey unto you the messages of my Lord and am for you a true adviser.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I am conveying my Lord's messages to you and I am your sincere and honest adviser.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: I preach unto you the messages of my Lord, and I am unto you a counseller faithful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I communicate to you the messages of my Lord and I am a trustworthy well-wisher for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: I but fulfil towards you the duties of my Lord's mission: I am to you a sincere and trustworthy adviser.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: I convey unto you the Messages of my Lord, and I am a trustworthy adviser (or well-wisher) for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I deliver to you the messages of my Lord and I am your honest adviser.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “I convey to you the messages of my Lord, and I am a trustworthy adviser to you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: I convey to you the messages of my Lord, and I am to you a trustworthy adviser.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:68] I convey to you the Messages of my Lord, and I am your truthful adviser, trustworthy in the Message [I convey].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (I convey unto you the messages of my Lord) by explaining the commands and prohibitions (and am for you a true adviser) warning you of Allah's torment and calling you to repentance and faith, and I am trustworthy in conveying the message of my Lord. It is also said that this means: you used to consider me a trustworthy person, so how is it that you are now accusing me.
